channel.title: canon_eos_1000d on KevOps
channel.description: Recent content in canon_eos_1000d on KevOps

item.title: Merl
item.description: Shortly after snapping this image the Merl had enough of me starring at it and flew off.

item.title: Foggy Forest
item.description: A foggy view of a foggy forrest, taken from my balcony with my old Canon 1000D and Sigma 18-200mm F3,5-6,3.

item.title: Imbiss
item.description: Neon sign at night, taken during some festivities in Mainz, Germany.

item.title: Roadhouse
item.description: On my way to Berlin I snapped this image of a roadhouse at night.

item.title: Mond
item.description: A picture of the moon I took from my window when I was younger.

item.title: Pau
item.description: I spent one month in France working in a IT shop in Pau as part of my school education. I don’t speak a word french so this was quite fun and challenging.

item.title: Colza Field
item.description: Walking through the fields of a small town is always a good idea, you never know what you’ll find.
